summary: This is an email chain between federal prosecutors discussing whether to extend the seal on a 'triggerfish' warrant related to Ghislaine Maxwell. The seal is set to expire soon, and the decision is made not to extend it.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email chain's subject and content concern a 'triggerfish' warrant related to her. She is the central figure the legal action pertains to.

events.title: Inquiry about Triggerfish Warrant Seal
events.description: An email is sent inquiring if the seal on the Ghislaine Maxwell triggerfish warrant needs to be extended, as it is set to expire soon.

events.title: Decision Not to Extend Warrant Seal
events.description: A prosecutor replies that there is no need to extend the seal on the Ghislaine Maxwell triggerfish warrant, allowing it to lapse.

keyFacts: A 'triggerfish' warrant (likely a type of surveillance or tracking warrant) was active in the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation.
The seal on this warrant was set to expire in late December 2020.
Prosecutors communicated and decided not to extend the warrant's seal, allowing it to lapse.
